name: Blorange [Working Title]
description:
*NOTE: This game requires a keyboard to play. Use Arrow Keys, Enter, and Escape to navigate through menus.* Blorange [Working Title]

One cannot function without the other, and it is up to you to control two people to complete a set of puzzles to escape. In this new puzzle game, use two characters, Blue and Orange, to solve fun, mind-boggling puzzles that will be sure to test your abilities. Two characters are in different versions of the same room, with actions that may directly affect one another's reality. Move boxes, press buttons, flip levers, and more as you make your way through the chambers with each challenge being more difficult than the last. Will you be able to complete the task at hand and help the two travelers reach their destination?

Features
  • Engage in thought-provoking levels and traverse through chambers with characters Blue and Orange!
  • Switch between two different game states to clear unique puzzles!
  • Each level includes special mechanics, such as pulling vs. pushing and slippery movement!
Development Team
  • Main Programmer, Level Designer - Jonathan Alvarez
  • Audio Composer, Graphics Artist, Assistant Programmer, Level Designer - Gyle Viloria
  • Graphics Artist - Rebecca Slason
